BIO

I am a second year Software Engineering student at LUT University, Lappeenranta. Programming and everything tech related have been an interest to me ever since I was little. Below you can see my job experience.

Tokmanni Central Warehouse

Warehouse Worker

Picking up online store orders with a forklift, sorting and packing orders in the online store packing house and transporting them to the dipatch office.

PolarPro / Tammer Brands Warehouse

Warehouse Worker
